channel.title: Posts on Musings from AgileDave
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Musings from AgileDave

item.title: The Actor Model in a C# World
item.description: This post is the first in an occasional series on building a distributed system using Akka.NET. Check back as I add to this series. I was reminded of how much the Actor Model influenced me as a developer when I recently read Petabridge’s post about reflecting on 10 years of building Akka.NET. At first I thought, “oh my goodness - it’s been 10 years!!” and reflected on how much my life has changed over those 10 years.
